attributes.action: award a vc medal to brave soldier matthew croucer who flung his body over a grenade to help save his mates while fighting the taliban
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This brave 24 yr old set off a trip wire releasing a grenade,intending to kill or seriously injure our troops while fighting the taliban.Instead of panick he flung himself,with his back facing the deadly grenade to smother the force of the blast to save his loyal commando mates whom had helped him in the past.
